rukus.text: Cite por them ekzempl popol community ke ricev messengers
When ni send al them 2 (messengers) ili disbelieved them. Ni tiam supported them 3. Ili dir Ni est (Di) messengers vi
Ili dir Vi est ne plur than human beings us. Plej Gracious ne send anything. Vi est liars
Ili dir Our Lord kon ni est send al vi
Our pland misi est liver message
Ili dir Ni konsider vi mav omens Vi refrain ni surely sxton vi aflikt vi painful retribution
Ili dir Your omen depends your response tuj ke vi reminded Ja vi transgressing popol
Hom ven ali end urb dir O my popol sekv messengers
Sekv those ne pet vi por any wage kaj direkt
Why mi ne worship Unu iniciat me should al Him est your ultimate return
Mi set Him di? Plej Gracious willed any harm me their intercession ne help me 1 mord nor can ili rescue me
Tiam mi est totally astray
Mi hav kred en your Lord placx auxskult al me
(Je des temp da his death) li told Enter Paradise. Li dir Oh Mi wish my popol kon
Ke my Lord forgiven me far me honorable
Ni ne send down his popol him soldat cxiel; ni ne send them down
All pren est 1 blov whereupon ili ankoraux
Kiel sorry est popol stat! Cxiu temp messenger ir them ili cxiam ridiculed him
Ili ne seg kiel many generaci ni annihilated antaux them kiel ili neniam return them
Cxiu unu de them summoned antaux us
